entry.title: 精彩列表更新于 2024 年 12 月 16 日
entry.content:
1. 很棒的 Zsh 插件

主题/超级控制台- 仅限 Windows

  • cabovianco (⭐0) - 包括git状态和当前目录的装饰器。

2. 很棒的角度

风格指南/ Google 开发者专家

  • TypeScript 风格指南

文档工具/ Google 开发者专家

  • trakk.js (⭐2) - 自动文档生成/实时代码执行流程/测试/调试/前端应用程序入门。

其他组件/ Google 开发专家

  • ng-whiteboard (⭐51) - 轻量级 Angular 白板组件。

3. 非常适合初学者

科特林

  • Scribe-Android (⭐41) （标签：第一期好）
    适合语言学习者的 Android 键盘，提供翻译、动词变形等功能！

4. 神奇的灵丹妙药

框架组件

  • phoenix_storybook (⭐726) - 适用于 Phoenix 组件的可插入故事书。

5. 网页开发资源

可持续发展

  • 网站：灯塔

    描述：网页碳计算器，帮助估算和降低网页的碳排放量

  • 网站：碳网站

    描述：第一个网页碳计算器

  • 网站：生态分级器

    描述：网页碳计算器，包含有关用户体验的附加信息

  • 网站：网络可持续性指南

    描述：W3C 制定的可持续设计指南

  • 网站：可持续网页设计

    描述：由 Wholegrain Digital 和 MightyBytes 领导的设计师社区制定的设计指南

  • 网站：绿色网络基金会

    描述：使用可再生能源或通过抵消实现碳中和的网络主机数据库，也是 CO2.js 的作者

  • 网站： Tech Carbon Standard

    描述：技术排放的标准化模型，可帮助绘制组织内技术产生的排放 - 涉及网络和 Saas

6. 很棒的 Ansible

工具

  • Ansible Inventory Grapher (⭐441) - 显示清单继承层次结构以及在清单中定义变量的级别。

编辑器和 IDE 集成 / 法语

  • Vim - 一个开源、免费的命令行文本编辑器。有用的 Vim 插件包括：
    • Ansible vim (⭐800) - Ansible 2.x 的 vim 语法插件，它支持 YAML playbook、Jinja2 模板和 Ansible 的主机文件。
    • Ansible vim 和 neovim 插件- Ansible 的 vim 插件（lsp 客户端），它支持自动完成、语法突出显示、悬停、诊断和 goto 支持。
  • Emacs - 一个免费的开源文本编辑器和 IDE，支持自动缩进、语法突出显示和内置终端 shell（除其他外）：
    • lsp-mode - Emacs 的 Ansible 语言服务器协议支持：提供语法突出显示、自动完成和诊断。
    • yaml-mode (⭐492) - YAML 突出显示和语法检查。
    • jinja2-mode (⭐68) - Jinja2 突出显示和语法检查。
    • magit-mode (⭐6.6k) - Emacs 中的 Git 瓷器.
    • Flymake-ansible-lint (⭐7) - Ansible Lint 集成，在编辑时自动/连续注释错误、警告和信息。
  • PyCharm - 用于 Python 软件开发的完整 IDE。有用的插件包括：
    • Ansible Lint - Ansible Lint 集成与编辑时自动/连续注释错误、警告和信息.
    • Ansible Vault Integration - IntelliJ IDEA 的 Ansible Vault 集成，具有用于存储和取消存储机密的上下文操作.

7. 很棒的 Micropython

传感器/气压计

  • MicroPython-BMPxxx (⭐1) - BMP585、BMP581、BMP390、BMP280 博世温度/压力传感器的驱动程序。
;

entry.title: 精彩列表更新于 2024 年 12 月 15 日
entry.content:
1. 很棒的 Sitecore

无头

  • XM Cloud 的 Angular JSS 入门套件 (⭐264) - 适用于 XM Cloud 的 Sitecore JSS Angular 入门套件应用程序。

星梦云

  • Node XM Cloud Proxy (⭐264) - Node 代理应用程序可实现与 XM Cloud Next.js 入门套件中的后端功能和特性相同的功能。引入是为了支持新的 Angular 入门套件。该代理旨在与所有 SPA 框架配合使用，也可用于运行 React 和 Vue 应用程序，为未来为其他前端 JavaScript 框架构建的 JSS 入门套件奠定基础。

2. 很棒的角度

DOM / Google 开发专家

  • ngx-speculative-link (⭐5) - 受Quicklink (⭐11k)和 ngx-quicklink 启发的推测规则 API的 Angular 实现。

一般/ Google 开发者专家

  • @luistabotelho/angular-signal-forms (⭐1) - 使用信号实现表单的简单 Angular 库。

3. 很棒的围棋

联网

  • bart (⭐37) - bart 包提供了快速路由表算法。
;

entry.title: 精彩列表更新于 2024 年 12 月 14 日
entry.content:
1. 很棒的红宝石

Markdown 处理器

  • ZMediumToMarkdown (⭐36) - 一个强大的工具，可让您轻松下载 Medium 帖子并将其转换为 Markdown 格式。

联网

  • PacketFu (⭐381) - 用于将数据包读取和写入接口或 libpcap 格式文件的库。

2. 很棒的渗透测试

在线资源/渗透测试报告模板

  • 渗透测试报告- 信息中心，将公共渗透测试报告、公司、工具和漏洞列表集中在一处。

3. 很棒的 Ansible

工具

  • ansibledb (⭐20) - Flask API Web 服务器，使用 MongoDB 作为数据库来存储 Ansible 报告和事实；该工具可用于查询 Ansible 管理的主机和因素以及搜索 Ansible 日志。

4. 很棒的自托管

软件/分析

  • EDA (⭐122) - 用于数据分析和可视化的 Web 应用程序。 AGPL-3.0 Nodejs/Docker

软件/媒体流 - 多媒体流

  • Rygel - Rygel 是一个 UPnP AV 媒体服务器，可让您轻松共享音频、视频和图片。媒体播放器软件可以使用 Rygel 成为可以由 UPnP 或 DLNA 控制器远程控制的 MediaRenderer。 (源代码) GPL-3.0 C

软件/食谱管理

  • 酒吧助理- 酒吧助理是一个用于管理家庭酒吧的自托管应用程序。它允许您添加成分、搜索鸡尾酒并创建定制鸡尾酒配方。 (演示,源代码 (⭐626) ) MIT PHP/Docker
;

entry.title: 精彩列表更新于 2024 年 12 月 13 日
entry.content:
1. 很棒的Mac

阅读和写作工具/电子书

  • Readest (⭐298) - Readest 是一款电子书阅读器，具有跨平台访问、强大的工具和直观的界面。

实用程序/菜单栏工具

  • Peninsula (⭐221) - 适用于 macOS 的动态半岛，专注于窗口切换、通知和文件存储。

2. 很棒的钥匙斗篷

文章

  • 使用开放标准和开源软件构建可扩展的多租户身份验证和授权

3.免费开发

IDE 和代码编辑

  • Android Studio — Android Studio 提供了在各种类型的 Android 设备上构建应用程序的最快工具。开源 IDE 对所有人免费，是最好的 Android 应用程序开发。适用于 Windows、Mac、Linux，甚至 ChromeOS！

分析、事件和统计

  • Branch — 移动分析平台。免费套餐为多达 10K 移动应用用户提供深度链接和其他服务。

各种各样的

  • ReqBin — 在线发布 HTTP 请求。流行的请求方法包括 GET、POST、PUT、DELETE 和 HEAD。支持标头和令牌身份验证。包括用于保存您的请求的基本登录系统。

4. 很棒的Cpp

各种各样的

  • tiny::可选 (⭐107) - 替换 std::可选，不会不必要地浪费内存。 [BSL-1.0]

5. 很棒的角度

备忘单/ Google 开发者专家

  • Marmicode 食谱- 烹饪美味应用程序的配料和食谱。

集成/ Google 开发者专家

  • ngx-wagmi (⭐7) - 将 Angular 应用程序连接到区块链的重要工具包，让强大的钱包和合约交互触手可及。

图标/ Google 开发者专家

  • Coolshapes (⭐5) - 一个 Angular 库，旨在允许开发人员使用来自Coolshapes的带有小颗粒渐变的酷炫抽象形状。

模态框/ Google 开发者专家

  • ngx-dialog (⭐2) - 适用于 Angular 16+ 的类型安全 Angular 对话框指令。

6. 很棒的围棋

公用事业

  • jet (⭐6) - 只需编辑文本：一个快速而强大的工具，用于使用正则表达式查找和替换文件内容和名称。
;

entry.title: 精彩列表更新于 2024 年 12 月 12 日
entry.content:
1. 很棒的比特币

区块链 API 和 Web 服务

  • kibō.money - 开源比特币核心数据提取器和可视化工具（又名 FOSS Glassnode）

2. 很棒的锯齿形

网络/消息传递

  • by-nir/aws-lambda-zig (⭐3) - Zig 的超快速 AWS Lambda 运行时.

3. 很棒的 Neovim

运动/诊断

  • DanilaMihailov/beacon.nvim (⭐386) - 在移动、更改窗口等时突出显示光标。受到 Emacs beacon 包的启发。
  • Aaronik/Treewalker.nvim (⭐2) - 在抽象语法树中无缝移动。

游戏/诊断

  • csessh/aoc.vim (⭐3) - 简单的小精灵，为您获取 Advent of Code 谜题输入。

4. 很棒的颤振

后端/Redux/ELM/依赖注入

  • Nitric (⭐1.3k) - Nitric具有可插入部署的开源框架。

5. 很棒的动作

字幕

  • 字幕组指南 (⭐151) - 字幕组指南。 [英语]

6. 很棒的 Azure Openai Llm

目录

  • 第 7 节🧠： 提示| 微调
    • 及时工程
    • 微调：PEFT（例如LoRA）、RLHF、SFT
    • 量化与优化
    • 其他技术：例如 MoE
    • 视觉提示
  • 传说🔑：
    • ref ：外部网址
    • doc : 存档文档
    • cite ：评论来源
    • cnt : 引用次数
    • git : GitHub 链接
    • x-ref ：交叉引用
    • 📺：youtube 或视频

7. 很棒的角度

加载器/ Google 开发专家

  • Skeletonizer (⭐4) - 一个轻量级包，提供了一种为应用程序创建骨架化视图的简单方法。它具有适用于 Vue 和 Angular 的适配器，并且高度可定制且易于使用。

8. 很棒的 Rust

库/脚本

  • facebook/starlark-rust (⭐729) - 一种带有 Python 语法的小型、确定性、线程安全语言
;

entry.title: 精彩列表更新于 2024 年 12 月 11 日
entry.content:
1. 很棒的铁誓人

黑客和自制软件 / Ironsworth

  • 高坟下的居民- 从乌克兰的历史、民俗和风景中汲取灵感的场景

2. 伟大的戈多

插件和脚本 / Godot 4

  • NobodyWho (⭐29) - 用于“人工智能驱动”的 NPC 对话的本地大语言模型 (LLM)。

3. 令人敬畏的科学计算

数据格式/网格工具

  • HDF5 - 用于存储和管理数据的数据模型、库和文件格式。 （C/Fortran、BSD、 GitHub (⭐637) ）

4. 出色的集成

项目/API管理

  • Gravitee.io API 管理 (⭐205) (⭐199) - 灵活、轻量级、开源的 API 管理解决方案，提供全面的 API 管理功能，帮助您轻松管理 API。
  • WSO2 API Manager (⭐859) (⭐857) - 完全开源的 API 管理平台，提供全面的 API 管理功能，让您轻松管理 API。

项目/API设计

  • OpenAPI Diff (⭐841) (⭐837) - 将 OpenAPI 规范与版本控制进行比较，并以 HTML 或 Markdown 格式可视化差异。
  • Zally (⭐914) (⭐908) - 使用这个提供广泛分析和反馈的 linter 工具确保 OpenAPI 规范的质量。

项目/API文档

  • DapperDox (⭐410) (⭐409) - 适用于 OpenAPI/Swagger 规范的开源 API 文档生成器和服务器，具有可定制的文档、自动更新和轻松共享。
  • OpenAPI Explorer (⭐317) (⭐316) - 用于根据 OpenAPI 规范生成用户界面的工具，使软件工程师可以更轻松地可视化 API 并与 API 交互。

项目/API网关

  • Gloo Edge (⭐15) (⭐10) - 基于 Envoy 代理的 API 网关，为现代微服务架构提供高级流量管理、安全性和可观察性功能。

项目 / BRE

  • OpenL Tablets (⭐159) (⭐157) - 开源业务规则引擎（BRE、BRMS）和决策管理系统，允许用户定义、管理和执行业务规则和决策表。

项目/数据映射解决方案

  • JSLT (⭐639) (⭐638) - 受 jq、XPath 和 XQuery 启发的完整 JSON 查询和转换语言。借助 JSLT，软件工程师可以快速轻松地转换 JSON 数据以满足他们的需求。

项目/集成框架

  • Apache Camel (⭐5.6k) (⭐5.6k) - 一个强大的集成框架，使用企业集成模式来连接和统一不同的传输 API。

项目/消息传递

  • Apache Kafka (⭐29k) (⭐29k) - 专为高吞吐量和容错性而设计的分布式消息系统。凭借分布式架构和高效的数据存储，实现实时数据处理和流处理应用。

项目/工作流程引擎

  • Elsa Core (⭐6.6k) (⭐6.6k) - 一个库，可在任何 .NET Core 应用程序中执行工作流，从而更轻松地在 .NET 环境中自动化业务流程。

资源/数据格式

  • NDJSON (⭐688) (⭐686) - 用于在流协议中分隔 JSON 对象的标准。它可以高效处理大型 JSON 数据集，广泛应用于大数据处理。
  • YAML (⭐352) (⭐349) - 一种人性化且易于阅读的数据序列化格式，广泛用于配置文件和数据交换。它支持丰富的数据类型，并且与大多数编程语言兼容。

5. 很棒的Cl

工具

  • rod (⭐5) - Common Lisp 的不可变绳索.麻省理工学院。

迭代

  • cl-transducers - 符合人体工程学、高效的数据处理。 LGPL3 . ( GitHub 镜像 (⭐110) )
    • “传感器是一种符合人体工程学且极其节省内存的数据源处理方式。这里的‘数据源’指的是列表或向量等简单集合，但也可能是大文件或无限数据生成器。”
    • “总的来说，这是 Transducer 模式最完整的实现。”
    • 一个“现代”API，包含map 、 filter 、 take 、 repeat 、 cycle 、 fold ……

6. 很棒的极地

库/包/脚本/Polars 插件

  • Polars-h3 (⭐9) - 用于大规模地理空间分析的高效六边形索引，由@Filimoa提供。

7. 很棒的Mysql

连接器

  • ballerinax/mysql (⭐113) - MySQL 的官方 Ballerina 连接器。

8. 很棒的自述文件

示例

  • gitroomhq/postiz-app (⭐14k) - 清晰的描述。项目标志。动态图形视频、解释性 GIF。

9. 很棒的 Neovim

编程语言支持/诊断

  • nvim-java/nvim-java (⭐945) - 轻松 Java 体验所需的一切。

10. 很棒的角度

数据网格/ Google 开发专家

  • @guiexpert/angular-table (⭐1) - 与框架无关的表库，旨在与主要框架无缝集成，包括Angular 。

一般/ Google 开发者专家

  • @TanStack/form (⭐3.9k) - 采用一流的 TypeScript 支持、无头 UI 组件和与框架无关的设计，它简化了表单处理并确保跨各种前端框架的无缝体验。

图片/ Google 开发者专家

  • ngx-smart-cropper (⭐1) - Angular 独立组件，允许用户轻松上传、裁剪和调整图像大小。它提供直观的拖动和调整大小功能、网格覆盖，并支持各种宽高比和输出格式。

11. 很棒的铁锈

图书馆/日期和时间

  • burntSushi/jiff (⭐1.8k) - Rust 的日期时间库，鼓励您跳入成功的深渊。

12. 很棒的 Agi Cocosci

领域特定语言/设计理论

  • 何时以及如何开发特定领域语言- ACM 计算调查，2005 年。[ 所有版本]。 [ 预印本]。领域特定语言 (DSL) 是针对特定应用程序领域定制的语言。与应用领域中的通用编程语言相比，它们在表现力和易用性方面取得了显着的进步。 DSL 开发很困难，需要领域知识和语言开发专业知识。很少有人两者兼得。毫不奇怪，如果考虑的话，开发 DSL 的决定通常会无限期推迟，并且大多数 DSL 永远不会超越应用程序库阶段。尽管已经写了很多关于特定 DSL 开发的文章，但是关于 DSL 开发方法的文献非常有限，并且关于何时以及如何开发 DSL 的许多问题仍然存在。为了帮助 DSL 开发人员，本调查论文确定了 DSL 开发的决策、分析、设计和实现阶段的模式。这些模式改进并扩展了 DSL 设计模式的早期工作。
;
entry.summary: 2024 年 12 月 11 日更新的 12 个精彩列表，包括 Awesome Ironsworn、Awesome Godot、Awesome ScientificComputing、Awesome Integration、Awesome Cl、Awesome Polars、Awesome Mysql、Awesome Readme、Awesome Neovim、Awesome Angular、Awesome Rust、Awesome Agi Cocosci

entry.title: 精彩列表更新于 2024 年 12 月 10 日
entry.content:
1. 静态分析

多种语言/其他

  • SonarQube Cloud ©️ — SonarQube Cloud 使您的团队能够通过代码审查工具一致、高效地交付干净的代码，该工具可以轻松集成到云 DevOps 平台并扩展您的 CI/CD 工作流程。 SonarQube Cloud 提供免费计划。
  • SonarQube for IDE — SonarQube for IDE（以前称为 SonarLint）是一个免费的 IDE 扩展，可用于 IntelliJ、VS Code、Visual Studio 和 Eclipse，可以实时查找和修复编码问题，在编码时标记问题，就像咒语一样-检查器。它不仅仅是一个检查工具，还提供丰富的上下文指导，帮助开发人员了解出现问题的原因、评估风险并指导他们如何解决问题。
  • SonarQube 服务器— SonarQube 为开发团队提供了深度集成到您的企业环境中的代码质量和安全解决方案；使您能够一致、可靠地部署干净的代码。 SonarQube 提供免费且开源的社区构建。

5. 很棒的Cl

其他/ Google 开发者专家

  • @ng-state/store (⭐14) - RxJS 和 Immer（或 ImmutableJs）为受 NgRx 启发的 Angular 应用程序提供嵌套状态管理。它简单、快速、可靠，没有样板。支持信号和可注入动作。

entry.title: 精彩列表更新于 2024 年 12 月 8 日
entry.content:
1. 很棒的 Gbdev

编译器/实验/概念验证

  • Rust-GB (⭐189) - 一个编译器和库，支持使用 Rust 开发 GB ROM。

ASM/时序

  • 模式 3 精灵时序

2. 精彩的竞技编程

书籍/算法书籍

  • ☆：

    名称： 高级算法和数据结构，作者：Marcello La Rocca

    描述：本书提供了一种不同的算法方法，从更实用的角度平衡理论，每章都有一个部分重点介绍如何将算法应用于日常工作或竞争性编程中可以找到的实际用例;它还融合了经典、先进和新算法。

  • ☆：

    名称： Grokking 数据结构，作者：Marcello La Rocca

    描述：Grokking 数据结构仔细指导您从最基本的数据结构（如数组或链表）一直到强大的结构（如图形）。它非常适合初学者，您只需要高中数学即可开始。您遇到的每个数据结构都有其自己的完整 Python 实现，因此您可以立即开始尝试您所学到的内容。

3. 很棒的Mac

实用程序/窗口管理

  • JankyBorders (⭐1.5k) - 适用于 macOS 的轻量级窗口边框系统。

4.免费开发

电子邮件

  • Tuta - 免费安全电子邮件帐户服务提供商，内置端到端加密，无广告，无跟踪。免费 1GB 存储空间、一本日历（Tuta 也有付费计划。）。 Tuta 也是部分开源的 (⭐6.1k) ，因此您可以自行托管。

5. 很棒的 Zsh 插件

插件/超级控制台- 仅限 Windows

  • shellsense (⭐2) - 人工智能驱动的 ZSH 插件，旨在通过强大的功能和人工智能驱动的功能来增强您的终端体验。 ShellSense 使用 Python 开发，为各种任务提供简化的工作流程，使您的终端更加高效且用户友好。

6. 很棒的自托管

软件/自动化

  • PlexRipper ⚠ - 跨平台 Plex 媒体下载器，可将其他 Plex 服务器中的媒体无缝添加到您自己的服务器中。 (源代码 (⭐291) ) GPL-3.0 Docker

软件/文档管理

  • PdfDing (⭐39) - PDF 管理器和查看器在多个设备上提供无缝的用户体验。它被设计为最小化、快速且易于使用 Docker 设置。 GPL-3.0 Docker
  • SeedDMS - 具有工作流程、访问权限、全文搜索等功能的文档管理系统。 (演示,源代码) GPL-2.0 PHP

软件/游戏 - 管理实用程序和控制面板

  • Retrom (⭐752) - 私有云游戏库分发服务器 + 前端/启动器。 GPL-3.0 Docker/Rust

软件/库存管理

  • HomeBox (SysAdminsMedia) - 为家庭用户构建的库存和组织系统。 (演示,源代码 (⭐1.3k) ) AGPL-3.0 Docker/Go

软件/维基

  • docmost - 协作 wiki 和文档软件（Confluence、Notion 的替代品）。 (源代码 (⭐7k) ) AGPL-3.0 Docker/Nodejs

7. 很棒的围棋

项目布局

  • kickstart.go (⭐72) - 简约的单文件 Go HTTP 服务器模板，无需第三方依赖项。

通用唯一识别码

  • uuidcheck (⭐2) - 一个小型、无依赖的 Go 库，可根据标准 RFC 4122 格式验证 UUID，将 UUIDv7() 转换为 UTC 时间戳。
;

entry.content:
1. 很棒的 Neovim

Git / 诊断

  • trevorhauter/gitportal.nvim (⭐38) - 生成 Git 永久链接，在浏览器中打开它们，从永久链接本地加载文件等等。

Tmux/诊断

  • juselara1/tmutils.nvim (⭐2) - Tmux 实用程序，支持发送线路、捕获内容、创建终端和管理 REPL。

2. 很棒的角度

身份验证/ Google 开发者专家

  • ngxfire (⭐1) - 无区域 AngularFire 替代品。

HTTP/ Google 开发专家

  • ngx-http-request-state (⭐13) - 一个 Angular 库，用于使用加载和错误信息包装 HttpClient 响应。

3. 很棒的 Kotlin

库/框架/数据库

  • huanshankeji/exposed-vertx-sql-client (⭐5) - 暴露在 Vert.x Reactive SQL Client 之上

库/框架/Jetpack-Compose

  • huanshankeji/compose-multiplatform-html-unified (⭐17) - 通用和 Material Design API 的统一 Compose 多平台包装器，用于基于渲染的 Compose UI 和基于 DOM 的 Compose HTML
  • huanshankeji/compose-html-material (⭐29) - 基于 Material Web 编写 HTML Material 3 包装组件

4. 很棒的 Rust

应用程序/模拟器

  • 冲击波播放器
    • DirPlayer (⭐53) - 用 Rust 编写的网络兼容的 Shockwave Player 模拟器

库/压缩

  • 压缩包2
    • trifectatechfoundation/bzip2-rs (⭐98) - libbz2绑定

5. 很棒的 Osint

巴斯德宾

  • 卡特宾
  • 粘贴.ubuntu

代码搜索

  • Sourcebot - 在您的计算机上索引数千个存储库，并在快速、强大且现代化的 Web 界面中搜索它们。

社交媒体工具/Reddit

  • Arctic Shift (⭐286) - 一种用于访问大量 Reddit 数据并与之交互的工具，提供用于研究和审核目的的 API 和 Web 界面。
  • Pushshift API - 一个功能强大的 API，可提供对历史 Reddit 数据的访问，包括帖子、评论和用于分析和研究的元数据 - 更多信息请参见此处。
  • Pullpush - PullPush 是一项用于对 Reddit 用户提交给 Reddit 的内容进行索引和检索的服务。有助于查找已删除/删除的帖子和评论。
  • REDARCS - Reddit 档案 2005-2023。
  • RedditMetis -RedditMetis 是一个 Reddit 用户分析工具，用于查看 Reddit 帐户的摘要和统计数据，包括热门帖子和用户活动等。

社交媒体工具/电报

  • Maltego Telegram (⭐134) - 使用 Maltego 在 Telegram 上进行丰富的实体和转换

6. 很棒的 Agi Cocosci

领域特定语言/逻辑 DSL 应用

  • 定性模拟-人工智能，1986。[ 所有版本]。 [预印本]。本文提出了定性结构和行为描述的精确定义，作为微分方程和连续可微函数的抽象。作者提出了一种用于定性模拟的新算法，该算法概括了现有算法的最佳功能，并允许在替代方法之间进行直接比较。这项工作从从微分方程中抽象出的一组约束开始，证明了 QSIM 算法保证产生与原始方程的任何解相对应的定性行为。该论文还表明，任何定性模拟算法有时都会产生虚假的定性行为：与满足给定约束的任何机制都不对应的行为。这些观察结果表明，在设计定性因果推理系统的应用以及构建和验证机制描述的知识库时必须采取特定类型的谨慎措施。
;

未指定 / Google开发人员专家

  • NGX-NIGHTHAWK（⭐7） - 它提供了一组全面的组件，这些组件非常可配置和用户友好。该软件包集成了最佳的开源工具，例如Bootstrip，Bootstrip是一个简化的Bootstrap版本，仅着眼于网格和实用程序功能。
;

;

entry.title: 很棒的列表在2024年12月3日更新
entry.content:
1。很棒的棋盘游戏

家庭

硫磺的阴影：死亡的沼泽

硫磺的阴影：死亡的沼泽是一种快节奏的，完全合作的，地牢爬行的棋盘游戏，在旧西部设置，大量无法言喻的恐怖！玩家创造角色，扮演经典的西方英雄原型的角色，例如律师，枪手或轿车女孩。英雄们形成了冒险的姿势，冒险进入黑暗的矿山，被另一个世界的各种古老的恶魔和肮脏的生物淹没。凭借战术游戏玩法，很多骰子和强大的卡片驱动探索系统，没有两个游戏与英雄探索矿山探索寻找新的敌人，收集新的战利品以及要克服的新危险。

玩家甚至可以找到到其他世界的门户，踏上另一侧的冒险！

在死亡的沼泽中，玩家将遇到另一个术语的门户，这是一个潮湿的沼泽地，有意义的爬行动物，恶性恐龙和人形生物部落，从他们自己的门户网站关闭后，从返回他们的家庭世界上的不幸年就被切断了。

玩家分钟。年龄时间
1 - 4 12 90-180m

船员：深海任务

在挑剔的纸牌游戏中，船员：Mission Deep Sea，您和其他玩家共同努力寻找MU失落的大陆。这项新的冒险将您的船员带入深渊，以寻找传说中的沉没土地。您得到的多远完全取决于您团队合作的能力。卡片，trick戏，您的搜索聚会将发现前方面临的挑战，并构成通往MU的道路。

这个新版本的船员具有与受到极大赞誉的原始游戏相同的创新合作式欺骗机制，但令人兴奋的新惊喜！尽管您的船员之间的沟通受到淹没状态的严重限制，但这对您的成功也至关重要。在暗淡的深处找到隐藏的土地不仅取决于获胜的技巧，还取决于仔细谈判赢得的命令。如果事情没有按计划进行，您也许可以挽救操作，但是它将几乎完美无瑕地执行，也许有点运气才能最终到达MU。

玩家分钟。年龄时间
2 - 5 10 20m

那很聪明

在GanzSchönClever（德语“那是非常聪明”的德语）中巧妙地选择骰子，将它们输入得分表上的彩色区域，汇总棘手的链球得分机会，并提高积分！您不使用的骰子与您所做的骰子一样重要，因为每个玩家都可以使用所选的每个玩家都能使用的每个骰子，始终保持游戏中的每个人。

玩家分钟。年龄时间
1 – 4 8 30m

阿纳克（Arnak）的遗址

探险家在一个未知海洋的无人居岛上发现了一个伟大的文明的痕迹。现在，您将带领一场探险来探索该岛，发现失去的文物并面对可怕的监护人，以寻求学习该岛的秘密。

阿纳克（Arnak）的失落废墟将甲板建造和工人安置在探索，资源管理和发现游戏中。除了传统的甲板构建效果外，卡还可以用来放置工人，并且随着球员探索岛屿的探索，新的工人行动也可以使用。其中一些行动需要资源而不是工人，因此建立稳定的资源基础至关重要。您每回合只有一个动作，因此请仔细地做出选择...现在哪些行动将使您受益最大？您以后可以做什么...假设别人不先采取行动！？

玩家分钟。年龄时间
1 - 4 12 30-120

乘车票

...一次越野火车冒险，玩家收集各种类型的火车车的卡，使他们能够声称连接世界各地城市的铁路路线。

玩家分钟。年龄时间
2 - 5 8 30-60m

大流行

您可以在这个合作的游戏中拯救人类，在该游戏中，致命的病毒正在遍布全球？您将共同治疗疾病，分享知识并在世界各地飞行，以防止爆发并放慢流行病。

玩家分钟。年龄时间
2 - 4 8 45m

禁止沙漠

...玩家扮演着勇敢的冒险家的角色，他们必须谨慎行，并在狂热的热量和狂热的沙子中生存下来，以恢复埋葬在古老的沙漠城市下的传奇飞行机。

玩家分钟。年龄时间
2 - 5 10 45m

长老标志

坐落在一个洛夫克拉夫特恐怖的世界中，合作调查了一个充满奇怪人工制品和陌生恶魔的博物馆。收集Eldritch符号“ Elder Signs”，以关闭门户并防止生物入侵我们的世界。在时间到来之前或遭受古老的愤怒之前收集足够的收集。

玩家分钟。年龄时间
1 - 8 13 90m

欢迎来到

作为欢迎...的建筑师，您想通过向游泳池增加资源，雇用员工等来建立1950年代美国最好的新城镇。

欢迎来到...像滚动骰子游戏一样玩游戏，您可以在得分单上标记结果...但没有骰子。取而代之的是，您将三堆堆的卡片翻转，以制作三个不同的动作集，并同时使用一个房屋编号和一个相应的动作。您使用该号码按数字顺序填充街道上的房屋。然后，您采取行动来增加建造公园和游泳池的末端建造庄园的点价值。玩家还可以选择采取行动来更改或复制其房屋数字。每个人都在竞争成为第一个完成公共目标的人。有很多事情要做，成为成为最好的郊区建筑师的许多途径！

玩家分钟。年龄时间
1 - 100 10 25m

地下城与龙：城堡Ravenloft

Ravenloft的大师正在邀请客人共进晚餐 - 您将受到邀请！
邪恶的潜伏在城堡Ravenloft的塔楼和地牢中，只有特殊英勇的英雄才能幸免于难。
该董事会为1-5个玩家设计，具有多种场景，具有挑战性的任务和合作游戏。

玩家分钟。年龄时间
1 - 5 13 60m

退出游戏的小木屋

在一个废弃的小屋中寻找庇护所并过夜后，您和您的朋友意识到有人用组合锁定了门。摆脱困境的唯一方法是作为一个团队合作，破解代码并解决各种难题，以扣除导致自由的组合。

玩家分钟。年龄时间
1 - 6 12 60-120m

热度：踩到金属踏板

基于简单而直观的手管理，热量：踏板的金属使玩家进入了驾驶员赛车比赛的座位，争夺位置首先越过终点线的位置，同时如果他们不想过热，则可以管理汽车的速度。为汽车选择右升级将有助于他们拥抱曲线并保持发动机足够凉爽以保持最高速度。最终，他们的驾驶技能将是胜利的关键！

驾驶员可以参加一场比赛，也可以使用“冠军系统”在一个比赛之夜中打出整个赛季，在每场比赛之前对自己的汽车进行定制，以夺得领奖台。他们必须小心，因为天气，道路状况和活动将改变每场比赛以增添冠军。玩家还可以使用传奇模块享受独奏模式，也可以添加自动驱动程序作为多人游戏中的其他对手。

玩家分钟。年龄时间
1 - 6 10 30-60m

对El Dorado的追求

为了追求El Dorado，玩家扮演了探险领导人的角色，他们在南美茂密的丛林中搜寻了传奇的黄金之地。每个玩家都组装并装备自己的团队，雇用从童子军到科学家到原住民的各种助手。他们所有人都有一个目标：首先到达黄金边界并为自己赢得所有财富。谁选择最佳策略的人将得到回报！

玩家分钟。年龄时间
2 - 4 10 30-60m

奎德林堡的庸医

在奎德林堡（Quedlinburg）的庸医中，玩家是骗子（或Quack Doctors），每个人都会一次添加一种食材来制作自己的秘密酿造。不过，请注意您添加的内容，以使其捏太多，或者会破坏整个混合物！

每个玩家都有自己的成分筹码。在每回合中，他们同时从书包上抽取碎屑，然后将其添加到锅中。绘制芯片的面值越高，将其放置在锅的旋转图案中，增加了药水的价值。尽可能地推动运气，但是如果您添加太多的樱桃炸弹，您的锅会爆炸！

在每一轮比赛结束时，玩家会获得胜利点和硬币，以花在新的成分上，这取决于他们设法填满了锅子的能力。但是，盆栽爆炸的玩家必须选择点或硬币，而不是两者兼而有之！在九轮比赛结束时胜利得分最高的球员赢得了比赛。

玩家分钟。年龄时间
2 - 4 10 45m

财富潮

这是由Vanguard Games与Pas de Calais首次推出的Westwar系列的演变。使用类似系统的其他游戏也与远处的意大利竞选系列（西西里岛，萨勒诺，安齐奥和医学战争）。

《财富》潮是在比利时北部和低地国家的9月至10月的盟军运动中，最终以阿纳姆的行动为顶点。

比例为1-2天/转（由于脉冲系统而变量），3 km/hex。单位是军团/旅。

该游戏具有2 22“ x34”地图，300个计数器。

Through the Ages: A New Story of Civilization

Through the Ages: A New Story of Civilization is a strategic board game that combines elements of card drafting, civilization building, and resource management. In this digital implementation, players guide their civilizations through the ages, from antiquity to the modern era, focusing on advancements in technology, the construction of wonders, and the development of a strong military. Weaker aspects of a player's civilization can be exploited by opponents, making military strength a vital component. Victory is achieved by accumulating the most culture by the end of the modern age. With its deep gameplay and historical context, Through the Ages offers a challenging and immersive strategy experience for players aiming to build the most prosperous civilization.

The Castles of Burgundy

The Castles of Burgundy is an immersive board game set in the Burgundy region of High Medieval France. Players assume the roles of aristocrats seeking to expand their princedoms by building settlements, constructing formidable castles, engaging in river trade, exploiting silver mines, and harnessing the knowledge of travelers. The core gameplay revolves around selecting settlement tiles from the game board and placing them onto a personal player board, with each tile having a unique function. These tiles must be placed in regions that match their type. The game unfolds in five phases, each comprising five rounds. Players roll dice at the start of each round, with one player determining the availability of goods tiles. On their turns, players can perform two of four possible actions: taking settlement tiles from the game board, placing tiles on their player board, delivering goods, or obtaining worker tokens to adjust dice rolls. Bonus points are awarded for various accomplishments, and the game concludes after the fifth phase. Victory points are tallied, and the player with the most points emerges as the winner. With both basic and advanced rules, The Castles of Burgundy offers a deep and engaging gameplay experience, and it is part of the Alea big box series.

Following the success of unmanned rover missions, the United Nations established the Department of Operations and Mars Exploration (DOME). The first settlers arrived on Mars in the year 2037 and in the decades after establishment Mars Base Camp, private exploration companies began work on the creation of a self-sustaining colony. As chief astronaut for one of these enterprises, you want to be a pioneer in the development of the biggest, most advanced colony on Mars by achieving both DOME mission goals as well as your company's private agenda. In the beginning, you will be dependent on supplies from Earth and will have to travel often between the Mars Space Station and the planet's surface. As the colony expands over time, you will shift your activities to construct mines, power generators, water extractors, greenhouses, oxygen factories, and shelters. Your goal is to develop a self-sustaining colony independent of any terrestrial organization. This will require understanding the importance of water, air, power, and food — the necessities for survival.

玩家分钟。年龄时间
1-4 14 90–150 Min

捣毁

The "shufflebuilding" game Smash Up begins with a simple premise: take the 20-card decks of two factions, shuffle them into a deck of forty cards, then compete to crush more Bases than your opponents! Each faction involves a different gaming mechanism - the pirates move the cards, the zombies bring back the cards from the discard pile, the dinosaurs have enormous power - and each combination of factions brings a different gaming experience.

玩家分钟。年龄时间
2 - 4 12 45m

Mind the Gap

Mind the Gap is a card game that replicates the iconic design of the London Underground map, and the game is licensed by Transport for London. Players have a hand of cards, each representing stations on the London Underground. Each player lays a card face up and players in turn play cards that are on a line that matches that of the previous card. If they cannot lay a card, they draw a card. The winner is the first player to exhaust their hand.

玩家分钟。年龄时间
2 - 8 6 20m

Catan: Explorers & Pirates Expansion

Catan: Explorers & Pirates is the fourth major expansion for The Settlers of Catan. It includes five scenarios and three missions; some of the scenarios make use of the missions while others do not. This expansion is based on the CATAN base game rules but also contains a number of new game mechanisms. For example, ships are now equipped for expeditions and can be moved freely across the board. In the ships you transport settlers, crews, fish, or spices across the seas. The main goal is to build new outposts on the islands that are still undiscovered and to complete the Council of Catan's missions in the most skillful way possible. Catan: Explorers & Pirates differs from the Catan base game in three main ways. First, instead of having only a single island in the game on which players build and compete for resources, three islands are present. Second, instead of using cities, Catan: Explorers & Pirates allows players to build port settlements. Like cities, port settlements are worth two victory points (VPs), and the number of VPs required to win depends on the scenario. Third, if a player receives no resources during the production roll (other than on a roll of 7), she receives one gold in compensation. The winner is the first one who reaches 17 VPs.

玩家分钟。年龄时间
2 - 4 12+ 90-120m

Caverna: The Cave Farmers

Following along the same lines as its predecessor (Agricola), Caverna: The Cave Farmers is a worker-placement game at heart, with a focus on farming. In the game, you are the bearded leader of a small dwarf family that lives in a little cave in the mountains. You begin the game with a farmer and his spouse, and each member of the farming family represents an action that the player can take each turn. Together, you cultivate the forest in front of your cave and dig deeper into the mountain. You furnish the caves as dwellings for your offspring as well as working spaces for small enterprises. It's up to you how much ore you want to mine. You will need it to forge weapons that allow you to go on expeditions to gain bonus items and actions. While digging through the mountain, you may come across water sources and find ore and ruby mines that help you increase your wealth. Right in front of your cave, you can increase your wealth even further with agriculture: You can cut down the forest to sow fields and fence in pastures to hold your animals. You can also expand your family while running your ever-growing farm. In the end, the player with the most efficiently developed home board wins.

玩家分钟。年龄时间
1–7 12 30–210 Min

战列舰

In this two-person game of strategy, players secretly arrange their ships on a lettered and numbered 10x10 grid and then try to locate and destroy their opponent's fleet. There are two grids for each player. One grid is used for placing your own vessels and tracking hits made against you, while the second grid is for marking the hits targeted at your opponent. Take turns firing shots by calling out one of the grid's plot points. If a hit doesn't strike a ship, it's considered a miss and pegged with white pieces. If a hit makes contact with a ship, then that strike gets pegged with red. The number of hits each kind of vessel can sustain before it sinks is varied. After some initial exploratory firing, you will likely start to figure out the location of your opponent's ships and begin to deal the fatal blows. It's a battle on the high seas!

玩家分钟。年龄时间
2 8+ 30m around

万智牌：聚会

In the Magic game, you play the role of a planeswalker—a powerful wizard who fights other planeswalkers for glory, knowledge, and conquest. Your deck of cards represents all the weapons in your arsenal. It contains the spells you know and the creatures you can summon to fight for you. This is the grandfather of the collectible card game (or CCG) genre. Cards are categorized as common, uncommon, rare, and mythic rare. Players collect cards and build decks out of their collection. Players build a deck of cards and duel against an opponent's deck. Players are wizards attempting to reduce their opponent's life total to zero. The first player to reduce his opponent's life to zero (or meet another set win condition) wins the game. An important part of the game is deck construction, which is done prior to the actual game by selecting what cards are included in a particular deck. There are over 25,000 different cards from which to build your deck! Cards can be lands, which usually generate mana of various colors, or spells, which require a certain amount of mana to be used. Some cards (creatures, artifacts, and enchantments) stay on the board and continue to affect the game, while others have a one-time effect. Players randomly draw spells to see what they get and can play each turn. Although this limits your choices, there is a lot of strategy in how you play those spells. A robust list of game mechanics, including intricate rules for reactive card play called "the stack," provide for rich tactics and tough choices each turn. Though traditionally a two-player duel, there are several casual and tournament formats to Magic that allow more players to play.

玩家分钟。年龄时间
2 13 20m

智慧与赌注

Not a trivia buff?没关系！ In Wits & Wagers, each player writes a guess to a question such as “In what year did the bikini swimsuit makes its first appearance?” or “How many feet wide is an NFL football field?” and places it face-up on the betting mat.你认为你知道答案吗？ Bet on your guess. Think you know who the experts are? Bet on their guess. The closest answer — without going over — pays out according to the odds on the betting mat. Strike it big and you'll be cheering like you just hit the jackpot! Wits & Wagers is a trivia game that lets you bet on anyone's answer. So you can win by making educated guesses, by playing the odds, or by knowing the interests of your friends. It can be taught in 2 minutes, played in 25 minutes, and accommodates up to 20 people in teams.

玩家分钟。年龄时间
3 - 7 10 25m

Blood on the Clocktower

Blood on the Clocktower is a bluffing game enjoyed by 5 to 20 players on opposing teams of Good and Evil, overseen by a Storyteller player who conducts the action and makes crucial decisions. The goal of the game is to successfully deduce and execute the demons before they outnumber the townfolk. During a 'day' phase players socialize openly and whisper privately to trade knowledge or spread lies, culminating in a player's execution if a majority suspects them of being Evil. Of a 'night' time, players close their eyes and are woken one at a time by the Storyteller to gather information, spread mischief, or kill. The Storyteller uses the game's intricate playing pieces to guide each game, leaving others free to play without a table or board. Players stay in the thick of the action to the very end even if their characters are killed, haunting Ravenswood Bluff as ghosts trying to win from beyond the grave. If you arrive late to a game, you can enter after it's started as a powerful Traveller character with unusual talents and questionable allegiances. Each character comes with their own special ability and no two players in a game are ever the same character.

玩家分钟。年龄时间
5-20 15 30-120m

Space Marine: The Board Game

In the grim darkness of the 41st Millennium, Humanity is spread thin, fighting a losing battle against enemies all across the galaxy.Space Marine: The Board Game is a thrilling survival game, pitting the noble Lieutenant Titus of the Ultramarines against endless swarms of all-consuming alien horrors!The box is packed with 23 push-fit miniatures, dice, a ruler, a game board, and a 40-page rulebook packed with backstory and missions.You and a friend will take control of either the lone Space Marine, or more than 20 ravenous Tyranids that want to eat him alive.It's fast-paced action, as Titus fights valiantly to defeat his enemies with superhuman strength and brutal weapons.Can he hold them back, or will the Tyranids overwhelm him in the end?Space Marine: The Board Game represents the perfect foot in the door for anyone who's completely new to the Warhammer hobby.It's easy to set up – every model is push-fit – and can be played in around 30 minutes. So if you have friends or family who want to give the worlds of Warhammer a go, this is a brilliant place to start.

玩家分钟。年龄时间
2 12 30-60m

东京之王

In King of Tokyo, you play mutant monsters, gigantic robots, and strange aliens—all of whom are destroying Tokyo and whacking each other in order to become the one and only King of Tokyo.At the start of each turn, you roll six dice, which show the following six symbols: 1, 2, or 3 Victory Points, Energy, Heal, and Attack. Over three successive throws, choose whether to keep or discard each die in order to win victory points, gain energy, restore health, or attack other players into understanding that Tokyo is YOUR territory.The fiercest player will occupy Tokyo, and earn extra victory points, but that player can't heal and must face all the other monsters alone! Top this off with special cards purchased with energy that have a permanent or temporary effect, such as the growing of a second head which grants you an additional die, body armor, nova death ray, and more.... and it's one of the most explosive games of the year!In order to win the game, one must either destroy Tokyo by accumulating 20 victory points, or be the only surviving monster once the fighting has ended.

玩家分钟。年龄时间
2-6 8 30m

Kutná Hora: The City of Silver

Kutná Hora: The City of Silver is a historical city-building Eurogame for 2-4 players that features a real-life supply and demand experience in which every action you take has an impact on the game's dynamic economic systems.In each round, players take turns selecting actions from a hand of double-sided cards to engage strategic plans like mining, purchasing plots of land on which to build, gaining permits, raising buildings for their affiliated guilds, gaining profit from their production, and of course working towards the construction of Saint Barbara's Cathedral.The asymmetrical nature of each player's available guilds makes for highly interactive rounds in which each decision impacts the economy and other players in interesting ways as they expand their mines and build infrastructure across a shared board.Mine ore and smelt it into a fortune of silver for expanding this beautiful historic city, but take care to balance your personal goal advancement with the need to further the city's growth. Everything is connected, and sometimes the path to personal victory relies on the prosperity of the many.

玩家分钟。年龄时间
2 - 4 13 60-120m

The White Castle

The White Castle is a Euro type game with mechanics of resource management, worker placement and dice placement to carry out actions. During the game, over three rounds, players will send members of their clan to tend the gardens, defend the castle or progress up the social ladder of the nobility. At the end of the match, these will award players victory points in a variety of ways.The central panel shows Himeji Castle in all its splendor, divided into several zones. The largest is inside the castle, with the Room of the Thousand Carpets, where the courtiers must ascend socially until they reach the circle closest to the Daimio to enjoy his favor. There is also the pond and the gardens, patiently tended by the gardeners where everyone can relax and contemplate its beauty without restriction. Another important area is the wall and the outside of the castle, where the warriors patrol and stand guard. Finally, we find the area of the three bridges, where the three types of dice that can be used to carry out actions are accumulated, and the personal domain of each player, where they will keep track of their resources and where they will have the reserve of workers.With accessible rules and a very careful setting, The White Castle is a very versatile title that will fit in with different gaming groups. As is tradition with Llama Dice titles, its sleek and simple design belies a great deal of strategic depth within the grasp of players.

玩家分钟。年龄时间
1 - 4 12 80m

Five Tribes

In the fabled Sultanate of Naqala, the old sultan's passing has left control of the realm in contention, as strangers aim to fulfill the oracles' prophecy by shrewdly maneuvering the Five Tribes—Assassins, Elders, Builders, Merchants, and Viziers—across villages, markets, oases, and sacred places. Designed by Bruno Cathala, Five Tribes is a captivating twist on worker placement games, with meeples already in place at the start. As you invoke Djinns and make calculated moves, you must strategically consider when and where to displace the tribes to secure your influence over this legendary city-state, all while weighing different pathways to victory and outmaneuvering your rivals.

玩家分钟。年龄时间
2 - 4 13 40–80m

Lords of Vegas

You and your opponents represent powerful developers in a burgeoning Nevada city. You will earn money and prestige by building the biggest and most profitable casinos on "The Strip," the town's backbone of dust and sin. You start with nothing but parking lots and dreams, but from there you build, sprawl, reorganize and gamble your way to victory. Score the most points investing in the most profitable development companies and putting the best bosses in control of the richest casinos. Put your dollars on the line . 。 。 it's time to roll!.The game board is broken into 6 different areas, each consisting of a number of empty 'lots'. Players build lots by paying money and placing a die of the value matching the one shown on the lot's space onto the lot, along with a casino tile of one of 7 colors. Adjoining lots of the same color are considered a single casino. The casino's boss is the player whose die value is higher than any other in the casino. On each players turn, players turn over a new card representing a new lot they get. The card also is one of the casino colors. Any built casinos of the matching color will score both money and points. Money is earned for each lot in the casino, where each lot may be owned by a different player. Points go only to the casino's owner. Players can expand their casinos; try to take over casinos owned by other players; make deals to trade lots, casinos and money; or gamble in opponents' casinos to make more money. Ultimately, though, only points matter, and that means making yourself boss of the biggest casinos.

玩家分钟。年龄时间
2 - 4 12 60-90m

荣耀之路

Paths of Glory: The First World War, designed by six-time Charles S. Roberts awards winner, Ted Raicer, allows players to step into the shoes of the monarchs and marshals who triumphed and bungled from 1914 to 1918. As the Central Powers you must use the advantage of interior lines and the fighting skill of the Imperial German Army to win your rightful 'place in the sun.' As the Entente Powers (Allies) you must bring your greater numbers to bear to put an end to German militarism and ensure this is the war 'to end all wars.' Both players will find their generalship and strategic abilities put to the test as Paths of Glory's innovative game systems let you recreate all the dramatic events of World War I.

玩家分钟。年龄时间
2 14 480m

The Gilded Realms

The Gilded Realms is a euro-style kingdom builder board game set in a medieval fantasy world, where players will be tasked with ruling over their young but ambitious kingdoms. In this hybrid simultaneous turn-based game of economic management and risk assessment, you and up to three other players will command a unique Faction and compete for the title of ultimate regent.Through careful planning of two builds a turn and management of your resources you must develop your five provinces and construct a thriving income, all the while, fending off competing kingdoms and the invading Sarrukar forces with your armies and fortifications. Players can also earn Gold and Gems from successful caravan trading and management of their kingdom's stance during economic events. Or they can send armies into other player's Hinterlands to raid their Caravans and take Endeavour cards for themselves! At the end of the 12th round of play, players earn prestigious titles based on their Victory Points, the highest earning the Serpens Champion and declared winner of The Gilded Realms!

玩家分钟。年龄时间
2 - 4 14+ 90-180m

The Last Bottle of Rum

A pirate board game for 2 to 5 players, where you play as a pirate looking to trade its treasures for the very last bottle of rum of the archipelago... Prepare to explore uncharted waters, plunder your enemies and avoid the Kraken! To win the game, a player will have to score the most victory points by digging up hidden treasures.

On each turn, choose two cards from your hand. The cards you play determines the actions you may take. Cleverly combo actions and effects to overcome obstacles and keep pace with rival captains. Fire your cannons on your opponents to slow down their treasure-hunting. Push your luck at the risk of being cursed and chased by the deadly Kraken! Play one of the unique characters and use your game-changing abilities when it's least expected!

The first Captain to collect 10 booty points gets the last bottle of the archipelago and wins the game.

  • PhotoScout: Synthesis-Powered Multi-Modal Image Search - ACM SIGCHI'24 , 2024. [ All Versions ]. This paper explores a new multi-modal image search approach that allows users to conveniently specify and perform semantic image search tasks. With the tool, PhotoScout, the user interactively provides natural language descriptions, positive and negative examples, and object tags to specify their search tasks. Under the hood, PhotoScout is powered by a program synthesis engine that generates visual queries in a domain-specific language and executes the synthesized program to retrieve the desired images.
